channel.title: Edtech on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Edtech on C'est la Z

item.title: The Tech or the Teacher
item.description: Every morning one of the first things I do is quickly glance at my emails and other notifications. I really should wait until I'm more awake but old habits die hard. As some of you know over the past couple of years I've been making a series of videos and related post on using my editor of choice, Emacs. I've done 48 videos, have over 2500 subscribers on YouTube and people seem to find some value from the series.
